ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَ ۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ يَعْدِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Praise be Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, and made the darkness and the light. Yet those who reject Faith hold (others) as equal, with their Guardian-Lord.
ayas.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa waja`alaẓ ẓulumāti wan nūr ۖ thummal ladhīna kafarū birabbihim ya`dilūn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن طِينٍ ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلًا ۖ وَأَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥ ۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ تَمْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: He it is created you from clay, and then decreed a stated term (for you). And there is in His presence another determined term; yet ye doubt within yourselves!
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī khalaqakum min ṭīnin thumma qaḍā ajalā ۖ wa-ajalun musamman `indah ۖ thumma antum tamtarūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّكُمْ وَجَهْرَكُمْ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And He is Allah in the heavens and on earth. He knoweth what ye hide, and what ye reveal, and He knoweth the (recompense) which ye earn (by your deeds).
ayas.transliteration: wahuwallāhu fis samāwāti wafil-arḍ ۖ ya`lamu sirrakum wajahrakum waya`lamu mā taksibūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
ayas.translation: But never did a single one of the signs of their Lord reach them, but they turned away therefrom.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ta-tīhim min āyatim min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū `anhā mu`riḍīn

ayas.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: And now they reject the truth when it reaches them: but soon shall they learn the reality of what they used to mock at.
ayas.transliteration: faqad kadhhabū bil ḥaqqi lammā jā-ahum ۖ fasawfa ya-tīhim anbā-u mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مَا لَمْ نُمَكِّن لَّكُمْ وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْهِم مِّدْرَارًا وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرَ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمْ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَأَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayas.translation: See they not how many of those before them We did destroy?- generations We had established on the earth, in strength such as We have not given to you - for whom We poured out rain from the skies in abundance, and gave (fertile) streams flowing beneath their (feet): yet for their sins We destroyed them, and raised in their wake fresh generations (to succeed them).
ayas.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin makkannāhum fil-arḍi mā lam numakkin lakum wa-arsalnas samā-a `alayhim midrāran waja`alnal-anhāra tajrī min taḥtihim fa-ahlaknāhum bidhunūbihim wa-ansha-nā min ba`dihim qarnan ākharīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ كِتَـٰبًا فِى قِرْطَاسٍ فَلَمَسُوهُ بِأَيْدِيهِمْ لَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: If We had sent unto thee a written (message) on parchment, so that they could touch it with their hands, the Unbelievers would have been sure to say: "This is nothing but obvious magic!"
ayas.transliteration: walaw nazzalnā `alayka kitāban fī qirṭāsin falamasūhu bi-aydīhim laqālal ladhīna kafarū in hādhā illā siḥrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ ۖ وَلَوْ أَنزَلْنَا مَلَكًا لَّقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ
ayas.translation: They say: "Why is not an angel sent down to him?" If we did send down an angel, the matter would be settled at once, and no respite would be granted them.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila `alayhi malak ۖ walaw anzalnā malakal laquḍiyal-amru thumma lā yunẓarūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ مَلَكًا لَّجَعَلْنَـٰهُ رَجُلًا وَلَلَبَسْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّا يَلْبِسُونَ
ayas.translation: If We had made it an angel, We should have sent him as a man, and We should certainly have caused them confusion in a matter which they have already covered with confusion.
ayas.transliteration: walaw ja`alnāhu malakal laja`alnāhu rajulan walalabasnā `alayhim mā yalbisūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: Mocked were (many) messengers before thee; but their scoffers were hemmed in by the thing that they mocked.
ayas.transliteration: walaqadis-tuhzi-a birusulin min qablika faḥāqa bil ladhīna sakhirū minhum mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Travel through the earth and see what was the end of those who rejected Truth."
ayas.transliteration: qul sīrū fil-arḍi thumman-ẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul mukadhhibīn

ayas.arabic: قُل لِّمَن مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قُل لِّلَّهِ ۚ كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةَ ۚ لَيَجْمَعَنَّكُمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "To whom belongeth all that is in the heavens and on earth?" Say: "To Allah. He hath inscribed for Himself (the rule of) Mercy. That He will gather you together for the Day of Judgment, there is no doubt whatever. It is they who have lost their own souls, that will not believe.
ayas.transliteration: qul liman mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ qul lillāh ۚ kataba `alā nafsihir raḥmah ۚ layajma`annakum ilā yawmil qiyāmati lā rayba fīh ۚ alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fahum lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: To him belongeth all that dwelleth (or lurketh) in the night and the day. For he is the one who heareth and knoweth all things."
ayas.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fil layli wan nahār ۚ wahuwas samī`ul `alīm

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَتَّخِذُ وَلِيًّا فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَهُوَ يُطْعِمُ وَلَا يُطْعَمُ ۗ قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَسْلَمَ ۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Shall I take for my protector any other than Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth? And He it is that feedeth but is not fed." Say: "Nay! but I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah (in Islam), and be not thou of the company of those who join gods with Allah."
ayas.transliteration: qul aghayrallāhi attakhidhu waliyyan fāṭiris samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa yuṭ`imu walā yuṭ`am ۗ qul innī umirtu an akūna awwala man aslam ۖ walā takūnanna minal mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the penalty of a Mighty Day.
ayas.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in `aṣaytu rabbī `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: مَّن يُصْرَفْ عَنْهُ يَوْمَئِذٍ فَقَدْ رَحِمَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: "On that day, if the penalty is averted from any, it is due to Allah's mercy; And that would be (Salvation), the obvious fulfilment of all desire.
ayas.transliteration: man yuṣraf `anhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimah ۚ wadhālikal fawzul mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: "If Allah touch thee with affliction, none can remove it but He; if He touch thee with happiness, He hath power over all things.
ayas.transliteration: wa in yamsaskallāhu biḍurrin falā kāshifa lahu illā huw ۖ wa in yamsaska bikhayrin fahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: "He is the irresistible, (watching) from above over His worshippers; and He is the Wise, acquainted with all things."
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal qāhiru fawqa `ibādih ۚ wahuwal ḥakīmul khabīr

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَىُّ شَىْءٍ أَكْبَرُ شَهَـٰدَةً ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ شَهِيدٌۢ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَأُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لِأُنذِرَكُم بِهِۦ وَمَنۢ بَلَغَ ۚ أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَشْهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخْرَىٰ ۚ قُل لَّآ أَشْهَدُ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ وَإِنَّنِى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "What thing is most weighty in evidence?" Say: "Allah is witness between me and you; This Qur'an hath been revealed to me by inspiration, that I may warn you and all whom it reaches. Can ye possibly bear witness that besides Allah there is another Allah?" Say: "Nay! I cannot bear witness!" Say: "But in truth He is the one Allah, and I truly am innocent of (your blasphemy of) joining others with Him."
ayas.transliteration: qul ayyu shay-in akbaru shahādah ۖ qulillāh ۖ shahīdun baynī wabaynakum ۚ wa-ūḥiya ilayya hādhal qur-ānu li-undhirakum bihi wa man balagh ۚ a-innakum latash-hadūna anna ma`allāhi ālihatan ukhrā ۚ qul lā ash-had ۚ qul innamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun wa innanī barī-un mimmā tushrikūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَعْرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعْرِفُونَ أَبْنَآءَهُمُ ۘ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Those to whom We have given the Book know this as they know their own sons. Those who have lost their own souls refuse therefore to believe.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumul kitāba ya`rifūnahu kamā ya`rifūna abnā-ahum ۘ alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fahum lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Who doth more wrong than he who inventeth a lie against Allah or rejecteth His signs? But verily the wrong-doers never shall prosper.
ayas.transliteration: wa man aẓlamu mimmanif-tarā `alallāhi kadhiban aw kadhhaba bi-āyātih ۗ innahu lā yufliḥuẓ ẓālimūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآؤُكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ
ayas.translation: One day shall We gather them all together: We shall say to those who ascribed partners (to Us): "Where are the partners whom ye (invented and) talked about?"
ayas.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuruhum jamī`an thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū ayna shurakā-ukumul ladhīna kuntum taz`umūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ لَمْ تَكُن فِتْنَتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ وَٱللَّهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُنَّا مُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: There will then be (left) no subterfuge for them but to say: "By Allah our Lord, we were not those who joined gods with Allah."
ayas.transliteration: thumma lam takun fitnatuhum illā an qālū wallāhi rabbinā mā kunnā mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold! how they lie against their own souls! But the (lie) which they invented will leave them in the lurch.
ayas.transliteration: un-ẓur kayfa kadhabū `alā anfusihim ۚ waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yaftarūn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَجَعَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفْقَهُوهُ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًا ۚ وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كُلَّ ءَايَةٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهَا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوكَ يُجَـٰدِلُونَكَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: Of them there are some who (pretend to) listen to thee; but We have thrown veils on their hearts, So they understand it not, and deafness in their ears; if they saw every one of the signs, not they will believe in them; in so much that when they come to thee, they (but) dispute with thee; the Unbelievers say: "These are nothing but tales of the ancients."
ayas.transliteration: wa minhum man yastami`u ilayk ۖ waja`alnā `alā qulūbihim akinnatan an yafqahūhu wafī ādhānihim waqrā ۚ wa in yaraw kulla āyatin lā yu-minū bihā ۚ ḥattā idhā jā-ūka yujādilūnaka yaqūlul ladhīna kafarū in hādhā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: وَهُمْ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ وَيَنْـَٔوْنَ عَنْهُ ۖ وَإِن يُهْلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Others they keep away from it, and themselves they keep away; but they only destroy their own souls, and they perceive it not.
ayas.transliteration: wahum yanhawna `anhu wayan-awna `anh ۖ wa in yuhlikūna illā anfusahum wa mā yash`urūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ وُقِفُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰلَيْتَنَا نُرَدُّ وَلَا نُكَذِّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّنَا وَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: If thou couldst but see when they are confronted with the Fire! They will say: "Would that we were but sent back! Then would we not reject the signs of our Lord, but would be amongst those who believe!"
ayas.transliteration: walaw tarā idh wuqifū `alan nāri faqālū yālaytanā nuraddu walā nukadhhiba bi-āyāti rabbinā wanakūna minal mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُخْفُونَ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَوْ رُدُّوا۟ لَعَادُوا۟ لِمَا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Yea, in their own (eyes) will become manifest what before they concealed. But if they were returned, they would certainly relapse to the things they were forbidden, for they are indeed liars.
ayas.transliteration: bal badā lahum mā kānū yukhfūna min qabl ۖ walaw ruddū la`ādū limā nuhū `anhu wa innahum lakādhibūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
ayas.translation: And they (sometimes) say: "There is nothing except our life on this earth, and never shall we be raised up again."
ayas.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunad dunyā wa mā naḥnu bimab`ūthīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ وُقِفُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ قَالَ أَلَيْسَ هَـٰذَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَا ۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
ayas.translation: If thou couldst but see when they are confronted with their Lord! He will say: "Is not this the truth?" They will say: "Yea, by our Lord!" He will say: "Taste ye then the penalty, because ye rejected Faith."
ayas.transliteration: walaw tarā idh wuqifū `alā rabbihim ۚ qāla alaysa hādhā bil ḥaqq ۚ qālū balā warabbinā ۚ qāla fadhūqul `adhāba bimā kuntum takfurūn

ayas.arabic: قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً قَالُوا۟ يَـٰحَسْرَتَنَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطْنَا فِيهَا وَهُمْ يَحْمِلُونَ أَوْزَارَهُمْ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِمْ ۚ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Lost indeed are they who treat it as a falsehood that they must meet Allah,- until on a sudden the hour is on them, and they say: "Ah! woe unto us that we took no thought of it"; for they bear their burdens on their backs, and evil indeed are the burdens that they bear?
ayas.transliteration: qad khasiral ladhīna kadhhabū biliqā-illāh ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-at humus sā`atu baghtatan qālū yāḥasratanā `alā mā farraṭnā fīhā wahum yaḥmilūna awzārahum `alā ẓuhūrihim ۚ alā sā-a mā yazirūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۖ وَلَلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: What is the life of this world but play and amusement? But best is the home in the hereafter, for those who are righteous. Will ye not then understand?
ayas.transliteration: wa mal ḥayātud dunyā illā la`ibun walahw ۖ walalddārul-ākhiratu khayrul lilladhīna yattaqūn ۗ afalā ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: قَدْ نَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحْزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِى يَقُولُونَ ۖ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجْحَدُونَ
ayas.translation: We know indeed the grief which their words do cause thee: It is not thee they reject: it is the signs of Allah, which the wicked contemn.
ayas.transliteration: qad na`lamu innahu layaḥzunukal ladhī yaqūlūn ۖ fa-innahum lā yukadhhibūnaka walākinnaẓ ẓālimīna bi-āyātillāhi yajḥadūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَصَبَرُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا كُذِّبُوا۟ وَأُوذُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰهُمْ نَصْرُنَا ۚ وَلَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكَ مِن نَّبَإِى۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayas.translation: Rejected were the messengers before thee: with patience and constancy they bore their rejection and their wrongs, until Our aid did reach them: there is none that can alter the words (and decrees) of Allah. Already hast thou received some account of those messengers.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad kudhhibat rusulun min qablika faṣabarū `alā mā kudhhibū wa-ūdhū ḥattā atāhum naṣrunā ۚ walā mubaddila likalimātillāh ۚ walaqad jā-aka min naba-il mursalīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيْكَ إِعْرَاضُهُمْ فَإِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتَ أَن تَبْتَغِىَ نَفَقًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَوْ سُلَّمًا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتَأْتِيَهُم بِـَٔايَةٍ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَمَعَهُمْ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ ۚ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
ayas.translation: If their spurning is hard on thy mind, yet if thou wert able to seek a tunnel in the ground or a ladder to the skies and bring them a sign,- (what good?). If it were Allah's will, He could gather them together unto true guidance: so be not thou amongst those who are swayed by ignorance (and impatience)!
ayas.transliteration: wa in kāna kabura `alayka i`rāḍuhum fa-inis-taṭa`ta an tabtaghiya nafaqan fil-arḍi aw sullaman fis samā-i fata-tiyahum bi-āyah ۚ walaw shā-allāhu lajama`ahum `alal-hudā ۚ falā takūnanna minal jāhilīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَسْتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْمَعُونَ ۘ وَٱلْمَوْتَىٰ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Those who listen (in truth), be sure, will accept: as to the dead, Allah will raise them up; then will they be turned unto Him.
ayas.transliteration: innamā yastajībul ladhīna yasma`ūn ۘ wal mawtā yab`athuhumullāhu thumma ilayhi yurja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَادِرٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُنَزِّلَ ءَايَةً وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: They say: "Why is not a sign sent down to him from his Lord?" Say: "Allah hath certainly power to send down a sign: but most of them understand not.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila `alayhi āyatun min rabbih ۚ qul innallāha qādirun `alā an yunazzila āyatan walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا طَـٰٓئِرٍ يَطِيرُ بِجَنَاحَيْهِ إِلَّآ أُمَمٌ أَمْثَالُكُم ۚ مَّا فَرَّطْنَا فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِن شَىْءٍ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يُحْشَرُونَ
ayas.translation: There is not an animal (that lives) on the earth, nor a being that flies on its wings, but (forms part of) communities like you. Nothing have we omitted from the Book, and they (all) shall be gathered to their Lord in the end.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā min dābbatin fil-arḍi walā ṭā-iriy yaṭīru bijanāḥayhi illā umamun amthālukum ۚ mā farraṭnā fil kitābi min shay-ī ۚ thumma ilā rabbihim yuḥsharūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا صُمٌّ وَبُكْمٌ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ ۗ مَن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يُضْلِلْهُ وَمَن يَشَأْ يَجْعَلْهُ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Those who reject our signs are deaf and dumb,- in the midst of darkness profound: whom Allah willeth, He leaveth to wander: whom He willeth, He placeth on the way that is straight.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā ṣummun wabukmun fiẓ ẓulumāt ۗ man yasha-illāhu yuḍlilhu wa man yasha-yaj`alhu `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتَكُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ أَتَتْكُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَدْعُونَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Think ye to yourselves, if there come upon you the wrath of Allah, or the Hour (that ye dread), would ye then call upon other than Allah?- (reply) if ye are truthful!
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytakum in atākum `adhābullāhi aw atatkumus sā`atu aghayrallāhi tad`ūna in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ إِيَّاهُ تَدْعُونَ فَيَكْشِفُ مَا تَدْعُونَ إِلَيْهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوْنَ مَا تُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: "Nay,- On Him would ye call, and if it be His will, He would remove (the distress) which occasioned your call upon Him, and ye would forget (the false gods) which ye join with Him!"
ayas.transliteration: bal iyyāhu tad`ūna fayakshifu mā tad`ūna ilayhi in shā-a watansawna mā tushrikūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْبَأْسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: Before thee We sent (messengers) to many nations, and We afflicted the nations with suffering and adversity, that they might learn humility.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā ilā umamin min qablika fa-akhadhnāhum bil ba-sā-i waḍ ḍarrā-i la`allahum yataḍarra`ūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَوْلَآ إِذْ جَآءَهُم بَأْسُنَا تَضَرَّعُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: When the suffering reached them from us, why then did they not learn humility? On the contrary their hearts became hardened, and Satan made their (sinful) acts seem alluring to them.
ayas.transliteration: falawlā idh jā-ahum ba-sunā taḍarra`ū walākin qasat qulūbuhum wazayyana lahumush shayṭānu mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ أَبْوَٰبَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَرِحُوا۟ بِمَآ أُوتُوٓا۟ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بَغْتَةً فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْلِسُونَ
ayas.translation: But when they forgot the warning they had received, We opened to them the gates of all (good) things, until, in the midst of their enjoyment of Our gifts, on a sudden, We called them to account, when lo! they were plunged in despair!
ayas.transliteration: falammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihi fataḥnā `alayhim abwāba kulli shay-in ḥattā idhā fariḥū bimā ūtū akhadhnāhum baghtatan fa-idhā hum mublisūn

ayas.arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Of the wrong-doers the last remnant was cut off. Praise be to Allah, the Cherisher of the worlds.
ayas.transliteration: faquṭi`a dābirul qawmil ladhīna ẓalamū ۚ wal ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ سَمْعَكُمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرَكُمْ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُم مَّنْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأْتِيكُم بِهِ ۗ ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ثُمَّ هُمْ يَصْدِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Think ye, if Allah took away your hearing and your sight, and sealed up your hearts, who - a god other than Allah - could restore them to you?" See how We explain the signs by various (symbols); yet they turn aside.
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytum in akhadhallāhu sam`akum wa-abṣārakum wakhatama `alā qulūbikum man ilāhun ghayrullāhi ya-tīkum bih ۗ un-ẓur kayfa nuṣarriful-āyāti thumma hum yaṣdifūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتَكُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغْتَةً أَوْ جَهْرَةً هَلْ يُهْلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Think ye, if the punishment of Allah comes to you, whether suddenly or openly, will any be destroyed except those who do wrong?
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytakum in atākum `adhābullāhi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuhlaku illal-qawmuẓ ẓālimūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا نُرْسِلُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ ۖ فَمَنْ ءَامَنَ وَأَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
ayas.translation: We send the messengers only to give good news and to warn: so those who believe and mend (their lives),- upon them shall be no fear, nor shall they grieve.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā nursilul mursalīna illā mubashhirīna wa mundhirīn ۖ faman āmana wa-aṣlaḥa falā khawfun `alayhim walā hum yaḥzanūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
ayas.translation: But those who reject our signs,- them shall punishment touch, for that they ceased not from transgressing.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā yamassuhumul `adhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūn

ayas.arabic: قُل لَّآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ عِندِى خَزَآئِنُ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ وَلَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ إِنِّى مَلَكٌ ۖ إِنْ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ ۚ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْبَصِيرُ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "I tell you not that with me are the treasures of Allah, nor do I know what is hidden, nor do I tell you I am an angel. I but follow what is revealed to me." Say: "can the blind be held equal to the seeing?" Will ye then consider not?
ayas.transliteration: qul lā aqūlu lakum `indī khazā-inullāhi walā a`lamul ghayba walā aqūlu lakum innī malak ۖ in attabi`u illā mā yūḥā ilayy ۚ qul hal yastawil-a`mā wal baṣīr ۚ afalā tatafakkarūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَنذِرْ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَن يُحْشَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ۙ لَيْسَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ وَلِىٌّ وَلَا شَفِيعٌ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Give this warning to those in whose (hearts) is the fear that they will be brought (to judgment) before their Lord: except for Him they will have no protector nor intercessor: that they may guard (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: wa-andhir bihil ladhīna yakhāfūna an yuḥsharū ilā rabbihim laysa lahum min dūnihi waliyyun walā shafī`ul la`allahum yattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَطْرُدِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلْعَشِىِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجْهَهُۥ ۖ مَا عَلَيْكَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ وَمَا مِنْ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيْهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ فَتَطْرُدَهُمْ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Send not away those who call on their Lord morning and evening, seeking His face. In naught art thou accountable for them, and in naught are they accountable for thee, that thou shouldst turn them away, and thus be (one) of the unjust.
ayas.transliteration: walā taṭrudil ladhīna yad`ūna rabbahum bil ghadāti wal `ashiyyi yurīdūna wajhah ۖ mā `alayka min ḥisābihim min shay-in wa mā min ḥisābika `alayhim min shay-in fataṭrudahum fatakūna minaẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ فَتَنَّا بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍ لِّيَقُولُوٓا۟ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنۢ بَيْنِنَآ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعْلَمَ بِٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Thus did We try some of them by comparison with others, that they should say: "Is it these then that Allah hath favoured from amongst us?" Doth not Allah know best those who are grateful?
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika fatannā ba`ḍahum biba`ḍin liyaqūlū ahā-ulā-i mannallāhu `alayhim min bayninā ۗ alaysallāhu bi-a`lama bish shākirīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَقُلْ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ كَتَبَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةَ ۖ أَنَّهُۥ مَنْ عَمِلَ مِنكُمْ سُوٓءًۢا بِجَهَـٰلَةٍ ثُمَّ تَابَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ وَأَصْلَحَ فَأَنَّهُۥ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: When those come to thee who believe in Our signs, Say: "Peace be on you: Your Lord hath inscribed for Himself (the rule of) mercy: verily, if any of you did evil in ignorance, and thereafter repented, and amend (his conduct), lo! He is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā jā-akal ladhīna yu-minūna bi-āyātinā faqul salāmun `alaykum ۖ kataba rabbukum `alā nafsihir raḥmah ۖ annahu man `amila minkum sū-an bijahālatin thumma tāba min ba`dihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-annahu ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلِتَسْتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Thus do We explain the signs in detail: that the way of the sinners may be shown up.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlul mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى نُهِيتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهْوَآءَكُمْ ۙ قَدْ ضَلَلْتُ إِذًا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "I am forbidden to worship those - others than Allah - whom ye call upon." Say: "I will not follow your wain desires: If I did, I would stray from the path, and be not of the company of those who receive guidance."
ayas.transliteration: qul innī nuhītu an a`budal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnillāh ۚ qul lā attabi`u ahwā-akum qad ḍalaltu idhan wa mā ana minal muhtadīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّى وَكَذَّبْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ مَا عِندِى مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْحُكْمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ ۖ يَقُصُّ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْفَـٰصِلِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "For me, I (work) on a clear sign from my Lord, but ye reject Him. What ye would see hastened, is not in my power. The command rests with none but Allah: He declares the truth, and He is the best of judges."
ayas.transliteration: qul innī `alā bayyinatim min rabbī wakadhhabtum bih ۚ mā `indī mā tasta`jilūna bih ۚ inil ḥukmu illā lillāh ۖ yaquṣṣul ḥaqq ۖ wahuwa khayrul fāṣilīn

ayas.arabic: قُل لَّوْ أَنَّ عِندِى مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "If what ye would see hastened were in my power, the matter would be settled at once between you and me. But Allah knoweth best those who do wrong."
ayas.transliteration: qul law anna `indī mā tasta`jilūna bihi laquḍiyal-amru baynī wabaynakum ۗ wallāhu a`lamu biẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَعِندَهُۥ مَفَاتِحُ ٱلْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ ۚ وَمَا تَسْقُطُ مِن وَرَقَةٍ إِلَّا يَعْلَمُهَا وَلَا حَبَّةٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا رَطْبٍ وَلَا يَابِسٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: With Him are the keys of the unseen, the treasures that none knoweth but He. He knoweth whatever there is on the earth and in the sea. Not a leaf doth fall but with His knowledge: there is not a grain in the darkness (or depths) of the earth, nor anything fresh or dry (green or withered), but is (inscribed) in a record clear (to those who can read).
ayas.transliteration: wa`indahu mafātiḥul ghaybi lā ya`lamuhā illā huw ۚ waya`lamu mā fil barri wal baḥr ۚ wa mā tasquṭu min waraqatin illā ya`lamuhā walā ḥabbatin fī ẓulumātil-arḍi walā raṭbin walā yābisin illā fī kitābin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا جَرَحْتُم بِٱلنَّهَارِ ثُمَّ يَبْعَثُكُمْ فِيهِ لِيُقْضَىٰٓ أَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: It is He who doth take your souls by night, and hath knowledge of all that ye have done by day: by day doth He raise you up again; that a term appointed be fulfilled; In the end unto Him will be your return; then will He show you the truth of all that ye did.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī yatawaffākum bil layli waya`lamu mā jaraḥtum bin nahāri thumma yab`athukum fīhi liyuqḍā ajalun musammā ۖ thumma ilayhi marji`ukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ وَيُرْسِلُ عَلَيْكُمْ حَفَظَةً حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ تَوَفَّتْهُ رُسُلُنَا وَهُمْ لَا يُفَرِّطُونَ
ayas.translation: He is the irresistible, (watching) from above over His worshippers, and He sets guardians over you. At length, when death approaches one of you, Our angels take his soul, and they never fail in their duty.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal qāhiru fawqa `ibādih ۖ wayursilu `alaykum ḥafaẓatan ḥattā idhā jā-a aḥadakumul mawtu tawaffat-hu rusulunā wahum lā yufarriṭūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوْلَىٰهُمُ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلْحُكْمُ وَهُوَ أَسْرَعُ ٱلْحَـٰسِبِينَ
ayas.translation: Then are men returned unto Allah, their protector, the (only) reality: Is not His the command? and He is the swiftest in taking account.
ayas.transliteration: thumma ruddū ilallāhi mawlāhumul ḥaqq ۚ alā lahul ḥukmu wahuwa asra`ul ḥāsibīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ مَن يُنَجِّيكُم مِّن ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ تَدْعُونَهُۥ تَضَرُّعًا وَخُفْيَةً لَّئِنْ أَنجَىٰنَا مِنْ هَـٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Who is it that delivereth you from the dark recesses of land and sea, when ye call upon Him in humility and silent terror: 'If He only delivers us from these (dangers), (we vow) we shall truly show our gratitude'?"
ayas.transliteration: qul man yunajjīkum min ẓulumātil barri wal baḥri tad`ūnahu taḍarru`an wakhufyatan la-in anjānā min hādhihi lanakūnanna minash shākirīn

ayas.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنْهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرْبٍ ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ تُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Say "It is Allah that delivereth you from these and all (other) distresses: and yet ye worship false gods!"
ayas.transliteration: qulillāhu yunajjīkum minhā wa min kulli karbin thumma antum tushrikūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلْقَادِرُ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَبْعَثَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابًا مِّن فَوْقِكُمْ أَوْ مِن تَحْتِ أَرْجُلِكُمْ أَوْ يَلْبِسَكُمْ شِيَعًا وَيُذِيقَ بَعْضَكُم بَأْسَ بَعْضٍ ۗ ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "He hath power to send calamities on you, from above and below, or to cover you with confusion in party strife, giving you a taste of mutual vengeance - each from the other." See how We explain the signs by various (symbols); that they may understand.
ayas.transliteration: qul huwal qādiru `alā an yab`atha `alaykum `adhāban min fawqikum aw min taḥti arjulikum aw yalbisakum shiya`an wayudhīqa ba`ḍakum ba-sa ba`ḍ ۗ un-ẓur kayfa nuṣarriful-āyāti la`allahum yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوْمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ قُل لَّسْتُ عَلَيْكُم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayas.translation: But thy people reject this, though it is the truth. Say: "Not mine is the responsibility for arranging your affairs;
ayas.transliteration: wakadhhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwal ḥaqq ۚ qul lastu `alaykum biwakīl

ayas.arabic: لِّكُلِّ نَبَإٍ مُّسْتَقَرٌّ ۚ وَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: For every message is a limit of time, and soon shall ye know it."
ayas.transliteration: likulli naba-in mustaqarr ۚ wasawfa ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخُوضُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُوا۟ فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيْرِهِۦ ۚ وَإِمَّا يُنسِيَنَّكَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَلَا تَقْعُدْ بَعْدَ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: When thou seest men engaged in vain discourse about Our signs, turn away from them unless they turn to a different theme. If Satan ever makes thee forget, then after recollection, sit not thou in the company of those who do wrong.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā ra-aytal ladhīna yakhūḍūna fī āyātinā fa-a`riḍ `anhum ḥattā yakhūḍū fī ḥadīthin ghayrih ۚ wa immā yunsiyannakash shayṭānu falā taq`ud ba`dadh dhikrā ma`al qawmiẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ وَلَـٰكِن ذِكْرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: On their account no responsibility falls on the righteous, but (their duty) is to remind them, that they may (learn to) fear Allah.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā `alal ladhīna yattaqūna min ḥisābihim min shay-in walākin dhikrā la`allahum yattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لَعِبًا وَلَهْوًا وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَذَكِّرْ بِهِۦٓ أَن تُبْسَلَ نَفْسٌۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِىٌّ وَلَا شَفِيعٌ وَإِن تَعْدِلْ كُلَّ عَدْلٍ لَّا يُؤْخَذْ مِنْهَآ ۗ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُبْسِلُوا۟ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۖ لَهُمْ شَرَابٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْفُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Leave alone those who take their religion to be mere play and amusement, and are deceived by the life of this world. But proclaim (to them) this (truth): that every soul delivers itself to ruin by its own acts: it will find for itself no protector or intercessor except Allah: if it offered every ransom, (or reparation), none will be accepted: such is (the end of) those who deliver themselves to ruin by their own acts: they will have for drink (only) boiling water, and for punishment, one most grievous: for they persisted in rejecting Allah.
ayas.transliteration: wadharil ladhīnat-takhadhū dīnahum la`iban walahwan wagharrat-humul ḥayātud dunyā ۚ wadhakkir bihi an tubsala nafsun bimā kasabat laysa lahā min dūnillāhi waliyyun walā shafī`un wa in ta`dil kulla `adlin lā yu-khadh minhā ۗ ulā-ikal ladhīna ubsilū bimā kasabū ۖ lahum sharābun min ḥamīmin wa`adhābun alīmun bimā kānū yakfurūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَنَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُنَا وَلَا يَضُرُّنَا وَنُرَدُّ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَابِنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ كَٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَهْوَتْهُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ حَيْرَانَ لَهُۥٓ أَصْحَـٰبٌ يَدْعُونَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَى ٱئْتِنَا ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ هُوَ ٱلْهُدَىٰ ۖ وَأُمِرْنَا لِنُسْلِمَ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Shall we indeed call on others besides Allah,- things that can do us neither good nor harm,- and turn on our heels after receiving guidance from Allah? - like one whom the evil ones have made into a fool, wandering bewildered through the earth, his friends calling, come to us', (vainly) guiding him to the path." Say: "Allah's guidance is the (only) guidance, and we have been directed to submit ourselves to the Lord of the worlds;-
ayas.transliteration: qul anad`ū min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa`unā walā yaḍurrunā wanuraddu `alā a`qābinā ba`da idh hadānallāhu kal ladhis-tahwat-hush shayāṭīnu fil-arḍi ḥayrāna lahu aṣ-ḥābun yad`ūnahu ilal-huda-tinā ۗ qul inna hudallāhi huwal hudā ۖ wa-umirnā linuslima lirabbil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَنْ أَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
ayas.translation: "To establish regular prayers and to fear Allah: for it is to Him that we shall be gathered together."
ayas.transliteration: wa-an aqīmuṣ ṣalāta wattaqūh ۚ wahuwal ladhī ilayhi tuḥsharūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَيَوْمَ يَقُولُ كُن فَيَكُونُ ۚ قَوْلُهُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ وَلَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): the day He saith, "Be," behold! it is. His word is the truth. His will be the dominion the day the trumpet will be blown. He knoweth the unseen as well as that which is open. For He is the Wise, well acquainted (with all things).
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۖ wayawma yaqūlu kun fayakūn ۚ qawluhul ḥaqq ۚ walahul mulku yawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūr ۚ `ālimul ghaybi wash shahādah ۚ wahuwal ḥakīmul khabīr

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ ءَازَرَ أَتَتَّخِذُ أَصْنَامًا ءَالِهَةً ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰكَ وَقَوْمَكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: Lo! Abraham said to his father Azar: "Takest thou idols for gods? For I see thee and thy people in manifest error."
ayas.transliteration: wa idh qāla ibrāhīmu li-abīhi āzara atattakhidhu aṣnāman ālihah ۖ innī arāka waqawmaka fī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِىٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُوقِنِينَ
ayas.translation: So also did We show Abraham the power and the laws of the heavens and the earth, that he might (with understanding) have certitude.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika nurī ibrāhīma malakūtas samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna minal mūqinīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلَّيْلُ رَءَا كَوْكَبًا ۖ قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَآ أُحِبُّ ٱلْـَٔافِلِينَ
ayas.translation: When the night covered him over, He saw a star: He said: "This is my Lord." But when it set, He said: "I love not those that set."
ayas.transliteration: falammā janna `alayhil laylu ra-ā kawkabā ۖ qāla hādhā rabbī ۖ falammā afala qāla lā uḥibbul-āfilīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلْقَمَرَ بَازِغًا قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَئِن لَّمْ يَهْدِنِى رَبِّى لَأَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayas.translation: When he saw the moon rising in splendour, he said: "This is my Lord." But when the moon set, He said: "unless my Lord guide me, I shall surely be among those who go astray."
ayas.transliteration: falammā ra al qamara bāzighan qāla hādhā rabbī ۖ falammā afala qāla la-in lam yahdinī rabbī la-akūnanna minal qawmiḍ ḍāllīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلشَّمْسَ بَازِغَةً قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى هَـٰذَآ أَكْبَرُ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَتْ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: When he saw the sun rising in splendour, he said: "This is my Lord; this is the greatest (of all)." But when the sun set, he said: "O my people! I am indeed free from your (guilt) of giving partners to Allah.
ayas.transliteration: falammā ra ash shamsa bāzighatan qāla hādhā rabbī hādhā akbar ۖ falammā afalat qāla yāqawmi innī barī-un mimmā tushrikūn

ayas.arabic: إِنِّى وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِىَ لِلَّذِى فَطَرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ حَنِيفًا ۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: "For me, I have set my face, firmly and truly, towards Him Who created the heavens and the earth, and never shall I give partners to Allah."
ayas.transliteration: innī wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhī faṭaras samāwāti wal-arḍa ḥanīfā ۖ wa mā ana minal mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: وَحَآجَّهُۥ قَوْمُهُۥ ۚ قَالَ أَتُحَـٰٓجُّوٓنِّى فِى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَىٰنِ ۚ وَلَآ أَخَافُ مَا تُشْرِكُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ رَبِّى شَيْـًٔا ۗ وَسِعَ رَبِّى كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا ۗ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: His people disputed with him. He said: "(Come) ye to dispute with me, about Allah, when He (Himself) hath guided me? I fear not (the beings) ye associate with Allah: Unless my Lord willeth, (nothing can happen). My Lord comprehendeth in His knowledge all things. Will ye not (yourselves) be admonished?
ayas.transliteration: waḥājjahu qawmuh ۚ qāla atuḥājjūnnī fillāhi waqad hadān ۚ walā akhāfu mā tushrikūna bihi illā an yashā-a rabbī shay-ā ۗ wasi`a rabbī kulla shay-in `il-mā ۗ afalā tatadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَيْفَ أَخَافُ مَآ أَشْرَكْتُمْ وَلَا تَخَافُونَ أَنَّكُمْ أَشْرَكْتُم بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنًا ۚ فَأَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ أَحَقُّ بِٱلْأَمْنِ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: "How should I fear (the beings) ye associate with Allah, when ye fear not to give partners to Allah without any warrant having been given to you? Which of (us) two parties hath more right to security? (tell me) if ye know.
ayas.transliteration: wakayfa akhāfu mā ashraktum walā takhāfūna annakum ashraktum billāhi mā lam yunazzil bihi `alaykum sulṭānā ۚ fa-ayyul farīqayni aḥaqqu bil-amn ۖ in kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَلْبِسُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنَهُم بِظُلْمٍ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْأَمْنُ وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
ayas.translation: "It is those who believe and confuse not their beliefs with wrong - that are (truly) in security, for they are on (right) guidance."
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū-iymānahum biẓul-min ulā-ika lahumul-amnu wahum muhtadūn

ayas.arabic: وَتِلْكَ حُجَّتُنَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ ۚ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجَـٰتٍ مَّن نَّشَآءُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: That was the reasoning about Us, which We gave to Abraham (to use) against his people: We raise whom We will, degree after degree: for thy Lord is full of wisdom and knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: watilka ḥujjatunā ātaynāhā ibrāhīma `alā qawmih ۚ narfa`u darajātin man nashā-u ۗ inna rabbaka ḥakīmun `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۚ كُلًّا هَدَيْنَا ۚ وَنُوحًا هَدَيْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِۦ دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: We gave him Isaac and Jacob: all (three) guided: and before him, We guided Noah, and among his progeny, David, Solomon, Job, Joseph, Moses, and Aaron: thus do We reward those who do good:
ayas.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu is-ḥāqa waya`qūb ۚ kullan hadaynā ۚ wanūḥan hadaynā min qabl ۖ wa min dhurriyyatihi dāwūda wasulaymāna wa-ayyūba wayūsufa wa mūsā wahārūn ۚ wakadhālika najzil muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحْيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلْيَاسَ ۖ كُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayas.translation: And Zakariya and John, and Jesus and Elias: all in the ranks of the righteous:
ayas.transliteration: wazakariyyā wayaḥyā wa`īsā wa ilyās ۖ kullun minaṣ ṣāliḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطًا ۚ وَكُلًّا فَضَّلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: And Isma'il and Elisha, and Jonas, and Lot: and to all We gave favour above the nations:
ayas.transliteration: wa ismā`īla wal yasa`a wayūnusa walūṭā ۚ wakullan faḍḍalnā `alal-`ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ وَإِخْوَٰنِهِمْ ۖ وَٱجْتَبَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: (To them) and to their fathers, and progeny and brethren: We chose them, and we guided them to a straight way.
ayas.transliteration: wa min ābā-ihim wadhurriyyātihim wa ikhwānihim ۖ wajtabaynāhum wahadaynāhum ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَلَوْ أَشْرَكُوا۟ لَحَبِطَ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: This is the guidance of Allah: He giveth that guidance to whom He pleaseth, of His worshippers. If they were to join other gods with Him, all that they did would be vain for them.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika hudallāhi yahdī bihi man yashā-u min `ibādih ۚ walaw ashrakū laḥabiṭa `anhum mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحُكْمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ ۚ فَإِن يَكْفُرْ بِهَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ فَقَدْ وَكَّلْنَا بِهَا قَوْمًا لَّيْسُوا۟ بِهَا بِكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: These were the men to whom We gave the Book, and authority, and prophethood: if these (their descendants) reject them, Behold! We shall entrust their charge to a new people who reject them not.
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ikal ladhīna ātaynāhumul kitāba wal ḥukma wan nubuwwah ۚ fa-in yakfur bihā hā-ulā-i faqad wakkalnā bihā qawmal laysū bihā bikāfirīn

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَى ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَبِهُدَىٰهُمُ ٱقْتَدِهْ ۗ قُل لَّآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا ۖ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Those were the (prophets) who received Allah's guidance: Copy the guidance they received; Say: "No reward for this do I ask of you: This is no less than a message for the nations."
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ikal ladhīna hadallāh ۖ fabihudāhumuq-tadih ۗ qul lā as-alukum `alayhi ajrā ۖ in huwa illā dhikrā lil`ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ إِذْ قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ بَشَرٍ مِّن شَىْءٍ ۗ قُلْ مَنْ أَنزَلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِهِۦ مُوسَىٰ نُورًا وَهُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ ۖ تَجْعَلُونَهُۥ قَرَاطِيسَ تُبْدُونَهَا وَتُخْفُونَ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَعُلِّمْتُم مَّا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنتُمْ وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ ذَرْهُمْ فِى خَوْضِهِمْ يَلْعَبُونَ
ayas.translation: No just estimate of Allah do they make when they say: "Nothing doth Allah send down to man (by way of revelation)" Say: "Who then sent down the Book which Moses brought?- a light and guidance to man: But ye make it into (separate) sheets for show, while ye conceal much (of its contents): therein were ye taught that which ye knew not- neither ye nor your fathers." Say: "Allah (sent it down)": Then leave them to plunge in vain discourse and trifling.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrihi idh qālū mā anzalallāhu `alā basharin min shay-ī ۗ qul man anzalal-kitābal ladhī jā-a bihi mūsā nūran wahudan linnās ۖ taj`alūnahu qarāṭīsa tubdūnahā watukhfūna kathīrā ۖ wa`ullimtum mā lam ta`lamū antum walā ābā-ukum ۖ qulillāh ۖ thumma dharhum fī khawḍihim yal`abūn

ayas.arabic: وَهَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مُبَارَكٌ مُّصَدِّقُ ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
ayas.translation: And this is a Book which We have sent down, bringing blessings, and confirming (the revelations) which came before it: that thou mayest warn the mother of cities and all around her. Those who believe in the Hereafter believe in this (Book), and they are constant in guarding their prayers.
ayas.transliteration: wahādhā kitābun anzalnāhu mubārakun muṣaddiqul ladhī bayna yadayhi walitundhira ummal qurā wa man ḥawlahā ۚ wal ladhīna yu-minūna bil-ākhirati yu-minūna bih ۖ wahum `alā ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ قَالَ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ وَلَمْ يُوحَ إِلَيْهِ شَىْءٌ وَمَن قَالَ سَأُنزِلُ مِثْلَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ فِى غَمَرَٰتِ ٱلْمَوْتِ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَاسِطُوٓا۟ أَيْدِيهِمْ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمُ ۖ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ عَذَابَ ٱلْهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ غَيْرَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَكُنتُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Who can be more wicked than one who inventeth a lie against Allah, or saith, "I have received inspiration," when he hath received none, or (again) who saith, "I can reveal the like of what Allah hath revealed"? If thou couldst but see how the wicked (do fare) in the flood of confusion at death! - the angels stretch forth their hands, (saying),"Yield up your souls: this day shall ye receive your reward,- a penalty of shame, for that ye used to tell lies against Allah, and scornfully to reject of His signs!"
ayas.transliteration: wa man aẓlamu mimmanif-tarā `alallāhi kadhiban aw qāla ūḥiya ilayya walam yūḥa ilayhi shay-un wa man qāla sa-unzilu mithla mā anzalallāh ۗ walaw tarā idhiẓ ẓālimūna fī ghamarātil mawti wal malā-ikatu bāsiṭū aydīhim akhrijū anfusakum ۖ al yawma tujzawna `adhābal hūni bimā kuntum taqūlūna `alallāhi ghayral ḥaqqi wakuntum `an āyātihi tastakbirūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جِئْتُمُونَا فُرَٰدَىٰ كَمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَتَرَكْتُم مَّا خَوَّلْنَـٰكُمْ وَرَآءَ ظُهُورِكُمْ ۖ وَمَا نَرَىٰ مَعَكُمْ شُفَعَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُمْ أَنَّهُمْ فِيكُمْ شُرَكَـٰٓؤُا۟ ۚ لَقَد تَّقَطَّعَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنكُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ
ayas.translation: "And behold! ye come to us bare and alone as We created you for the first time: ye have left behind you all (the favours) which We bestowed on you: We see not with you your intercessors whom ye thought to be partners in your affairs: so now all relations between you have been cut off, and your (pet) fancies have left you in the lurch!"
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ji-tumūnā furādā kamā khalaqnākum awwala marratin wataraktum mā khawwalnākum warā-a ẓuhūrikum ۖ wa mā narā ma`akum shufa`ā-akumul ladhīna za`amtum annahum fīkum shurakā-u ۚ laqad taqaṭṭa`a baynakum waḍalla `ankum mā kuntum taz`umūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلْحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰ ۖ يُخْرِجُ ٱلْحَىَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَيِّتِ وَمُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلْحَىِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
ayas.translation: It is Allah Who causeth the seed-grain and the date-stone to split and sprout. He causeth the living to issue from the dead, and He is the one to cause the dead to issue from the living. That is Allah: then how are ye deluded away from the truth?
ayas.transliteration: innallāha fāliqul ḥabbi wan nawā ۖ yukhrijul ḥayya minal mayyiti wa mukhrijul mayyiti minal ḥayy ۚ dhālikumullāh ۖ fa-annā tu-fakūn

ayas.arabic: فَالِقُ ٱلْإِصْبَاحِ وَجَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ سَكَنًا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ حُسْبَانًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
ayas.translation: He it is that cleaveth the day-break (from the dark): He makes the night for rest and tranquillity, and the sun and moon for the reckoning (of time): Such is the judgment and ordering of (Him), the Exalted in Power, the Omniscient.
ayas.transliteration: fāliqul-iṣbāḥi waja`alal layla sakanan wash shamsa wal qamara ḥusbānā ۚ dhālika taqdīrul `azīzil `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلنُّجُومَ لِتَهْتَدُوا۟ بِهَا فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: It is He Who maketh the stars (as beacons) for you, that ye may guide yourselves, with their help, through the dark spaces of land and sea: We detail Our signs for people who know.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī ja`ala lakumun nujūma litahtadū bihā fī ẓulumātil barri wal baḥr ۗ qad faṣṣalnal-āyāti liqawmiy ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ فَمُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمُسْتَوْدَعٌ ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: It is He Who hath produced you from a single person: here is a place of sojourn and a place of departure: We detail Our signs for people who understand.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī ansha-akum min nafsin wāḥidatin famustaqarrun wa mustawda` ۗ qad faṣṣalnal-āyāti liqawmiy yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًا نُّخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّا مُّتَرَاكِبًا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّخْلِ مِن طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌ دَانِيَةٌ وَجَنَّـٰتٍ مِّنْ أَعْنَابٍ وَٱلزَّيْتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَـٰبِهٍ ۗ ٱنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثْمَرَ وَيَنْعِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكُمْ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: It is He Who sendeth down rain from the skies: with it We produce vegetation of all kinds: from some We produce green (crops), out of which We produce grain, heaped up (at harvest); out of the date-palm and its sheaths (or spathes) (come) clusters of dates hanging low and near: and (then there are) gardens of grapes, and olives, and pomegranates, each similar (in kind) yet different (in variety): when they begin to bear fruit, feast your eyes with the fruit and the ripeness thereof. Behold! in these things there are signs for people who believe.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī anzala minas samā-i mā-an fa-akhrajnā bihi nabāta kulli shay-in fa-akhrajnā minhu khaḍiran nukhriju minhu ḥabban mutarākiban wa minan nakhli min ṭal`ihā qinwānun dāniyatun wajannātin min a`nābin waz zaytūna war rummāna mushtabihan waghayra mutashābih ۗ un-ẓurū ilā thamarihi idhā athmara wayan`ih ۚ inna fī dhālikum la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ ٱلْجِنَّ وَخَلَقَهُمْ ۖ وَخَرَقُوا۟ لَهُۥ بَنِينَ وَبَنَـٰتٍۭ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Yet they make the Jinns equals with Allah, though Allah did create the Jinns; and they falsely, having no knowledge, attribute to Him sons and daughters. Praise and glory be to Him! (for He is) above what they attribute to Him!
ayas.transliteration: waja`alū lillāhi shurakā-al jinna wakhalaqahum ۖ wakharaqū lahu banīna wabanātin bighayri `il-m ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yaṣifūn

ayas.arabic: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌ وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ صَـٰحِبَةٌ ۖ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: To Him is due the primal origin of the heavens and the earth: How can He have a son when He hath no consort? He created all things, and He hath full knowledge of all things.
ayas.transliteration: badī`us samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ annā yakūnu lahu waladun walam takun lahu ṣāḥibah ۖ wakhalaqa kulla shay-ī ۖ wahuwa bikulli shay-in `alīm

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
ayas.translation: That is Allah, your Lord! there is no god but He, the Creator of all things: then worship ye Him: and He hath power to dispose of all affairs.
ayas.transliteration: dhālikumullāhu rabbukum ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۖ khāliqu kulli shay-in fa`budūh ۚ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in wakīl

ayas.arabic: لَّا تُدْرِكُهُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدْرِكُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: No vision can grasp Him, but His grasp is over all vision: He is above all comprehension, yet is acquainted with all things.
ayas.transliteration: lā tudrikuhul-abṣāru wahuwa yudrikul-abṣār ۖ wahuwallaṭīful khabīr

ayas.arabic: قَدْ جَآءَكُم بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَنْ أَبْصَرَ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ عَمِىَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيْكُم بِحَفِيظٍ
ayas.translation: "Now have come to you, from your Lord, proofs (to open your eyes): if any will see, it will be for (the good of) his own soul; if any will be blind, it will be to his own (harm): I am not (here) to watch over your doings."
ayas.transliteration: qad jā-akum baṣā-iru min rabbikum ۖ faman abṣara falinafsih ۖ wa man `amiya fa`alayhā ۚ wa mā ana `alaykum biḥafīẓ

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُوا۟ دَرَسْتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Thus do we explain the signs by various (symbols): that they may say, "Thou hast taught (us) diligently," and that We may make the matter clear to those who know.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika nuṣarriful-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmiy ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: ٱتَّبِعْ مَآ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: Follow what thou art taught by inspiration from thy Lord: there is no god but He: and turn aside from those who join gods with Allah.
ayas.transliteration: ittabi` mā ūḥiya ilayka min rabbik ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۖ wa-a`riḍ `anil mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشْرَكُوا۟ ۗ وَمَا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayas.translation: If it had been Allah's plan, they would not have taken false gods: but We made thee not one to watch over their doings, nor art thou set over them to dispose of their affairs.
ayas.transliteration: walaw shā-allāhu mā ashrakū ۗ wa mā ja`alnāka `alayhim ḥafīẓā ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَسُبُّوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَسُبُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَدْوًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ زَيَّنَّا لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ عَمَلَهُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِم مَّرْجِعُهُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Revile not ye those whom they call upon besides Allah, lest they out of spite revile Allah in their ignorance. Thus have We made alluring to each people its own doings. In the end will they return to their Lord, and We shall then tell them the truth of all that they did.
ayas.transliteration: walā tasubbul ladhīna yad`ūna min dūnillāhi fayasubbullāha `adwan bighayri `il-m ۗ kadhālika zayyannā likulli ummatin `amalahum thumma ilā rabbihim marji`uhum fayunabbi-uhum bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِن جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَةٌ لَّيُؤْمِنُنَّ بِهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَا يُشْعِرُكُمْ أَنَّهَآ إِذَا جَآءَتْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah, that if a (special) sign came to them, by it they would believe. Say: "Certainly (all) signs are in the power of Allah: but what will make you (Muslims) realise that (even) if (special) signs came, they will not believe."?
ayas.transliteration: wa-aqsamū billāhi jahda aymānihim la-in jā-at hum āyatun layu-minunna bihā ۚ qul innamal-āyātu `indallāh ۖ wa mā yush`irukum annahā idhā jā-at lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفْـِٔدَتَهُمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ كَمَا لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَنَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayas.translation: We (too) shall turn to (confusion) their hearts and their eyes, even as they refused to believe in this in the first instance: We shall leave them in their trespasses, to wander in distraction.
ayas.transliteration: wanuqallibu af-idatahum wa-abṣārahum kamā lam yu-minū bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim ya`mahūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّنَا نَزَّلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ وَكَلَّمَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَحَشَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ قُبُلًا مَّا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَجْهَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Even if We did send unto them angels, and the dead did speak unto them, and We gathered together all things before their very eyes, they are not the ones to believe, unless it is in Allah's plan. But most of them ignore (the truth).
ayas.transliteration: walaw annanā nazzalnā ilayhimul malā-ikata wakallamahumul mawtā waḥasharnā `alayhim kulla shay-in qubulan mā kānū liyu-minū illā an yashā-allāhu walākinna aktharahum yajhalūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّا شَيَـٰطِينَ ٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلْجِنِّ يُوحِى بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ زُخْرُفَ ٱلْقَوْلِ غُرُورًا ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ مَا فَعَلُوهُ ۖ فَذَرْهُمْ وَمَا يَفْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Likewise did We make for every Messenger an enemy,- evil ones among men and jinns, inspiring each other with flowery discourses by way of deception. If thy Lord had so planned, they would not have done it: so leave them and their inventions alone.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika ja`alnā likulli nabiyyin `aduwwan shayāṭīnal-insi wal jinni yūḥī ba`ḍuhum ilā ba`ḍin zukhrufal qawli ghurūrā ۚ walaw shā-a rabbuka mā fa`alūh ۖ fadharhum wa mā yaftarūn

ayas.arabic: وَلِتَصْغَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ أَفْـِٔدَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَلِيَرْضَوْهُ وَلِيَقْتَرِفُوا۟ مَا هُم مُّقْتَرِفُونَ
ayas.translation: To such (deceit) let the hearts of those incline, who have no faith in the hereafter: let them delight in it, and let them earn from it what they may.
ayas.transliteration: walitaṣghā ilayhi af-idatul ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati waliyarḍawhu waliyaqtarifū mā hum muqtarifūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْتَغِى حَكَمًا وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مُفَصَّلًا ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُۥ مُنَزَّلٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُمْتَرِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: "Shall I seek for judge other than Allah? - when He it is Who hath sent unto you the Book, explained in detail." They know full well, to whom We have given the Book, that it hath been sent down from thy Lord in truth. Never be then of those who doubt.
ayas.transliteration: afaghayrallāhi abtaghī ḥakaman wahuwal ladhī anzala ilaykumul kitāba mufaṣṣalā ۚ wal ladhīna ātaynāhumul kitāba ya`lamūna annahu munazzalun min rabbika bil ḥaqq ۖ falā takūnanna minal mumtarīn

ayas.arabic: وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدْقًا وَعَدْلًا ۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: The word of thy Lord doth find its fulfilment in truth and in justice: None can change His words: for He is the one who heareth and knoweth all.
ayas.transliteration: watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣidqan wa`adlā ۚ lā mubaddila likalimātih ۚ wahuwas samī`ul `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِن تُطِعْ أَكْثَرَ مَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يُضِلُّوكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَخْرُصُونَ
ayas.translation: Wert thou to follow the common run of those on earth, they will lead thee away from the way of Allah. They follow nothing but conjecture: they do nothing but lie.
ayas.transliteration: wa in tuṭi` akthara man fil-arḍi yuḍillūka `an sabīlillāh ۚ in yattabi`ūna illaẓ ẓanna wa in hum illā yakhruṣūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
ayas.translation: Thy Lord knoweth best who strayeth from His way: He knoweth best who they are that receive His guidance.
ayas.transliteration: inna rabbaka huwa a`lamu man yaḍillu `an sabīlih ۖ wahuwa a`lamu bil muhtadīn

ayas.arabic: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: So eat of (meats) on which Allah's name hath been pronounced, if ye have faith in His signs.
ayas.transliteration: fakulū mimmā dhukiras-mullāhi `alayhi in kuntum bi-āyātihi mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَقَدْ فَصَّلَ لَكُم مَّا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِلَّا مَا ٱضْطُرِرْتُمْ إِلَيْهِ ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا لَّيُضِلُّونَ بِأَهْوَآئِهِم بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
ayas.translation: Why should ye not eat of (meats) on which Allah's name hath been pronounced, when He hath explained to you in detail what is forbidden to you - except under compulsion of necessity? But many do mislead (men) by their appetites unchecked by knowledge. Thy Lord knoweth best those who transgress.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā lakum allā ta-kulū mimmā dhukiras-mullāhi `alayhi waqad faṣṣala lakum mā ḥarrama `alaykum illā maḍ-ṭurirtum ilayh ۗ wa inna kathīral layuḍillūna bi-ahwā-ihim bighayri `il-m ۗ inna rabbaka huwa a`lamu bil mu`tadīn

ayas.arabic: وَذَرُوا۟ ظَـٰهِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكْسِبُونَ ٱلْإِثْمَ سَيُجْزَوْنَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَقْتَرِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Eschew all sin, open or secret: those who earn sin will get due recompense for their "earnings."
ayas.transliteration: wadharū ẓāhiral-ithmi wabāṭinah ۚ innal ladhīna yaksibūnal-ithma sayujzawna bimā kānū yaqtarifūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا لَمْ يُذْكَرِ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِسْقٌ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ لَيُوحُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَوْلِيَآئِهِمْ لِيُجَـٰدِلُوكُمْ ۖ وَإِنْ أَطَعْتُمُوهُمْ إِنَّكُمْ لَمُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Eat not of (meats) on which Allah's name hath not been pronounced: That would be impiety. But the evil ones ever inspire their friends to contend with you if ye were to obey them, ye would indeed be Pagans.
ayas.transliteration: walā ta-kulū mimmā lam yudhkaris-mullāhi `alayhi wa innahu lafisq ۗ wa innash shayāṭīna layūḥūna ilā awliyā-ihim liyujādilūkum ۖ wa in aṭa`tumūhum innakum lamushrikūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَمَن كَانَ مَيْتًا فَأَحْيَيْنَـٰهُ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُۥ نُورًا يَمْشِى بِهِۦ فِى ٱلنَّاسِ كَمَن مَّثَلُهُۥ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ لَيْسَ بِخَارِجٍ مِّنْهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Can he who was dead, to whom We gave life, and a light whereby he can walk amongst men, be like him who is in the depths of darkness, from which he can never come out? Thus to those without faith their own deeds seem pleasing.
ayas.transliteration: awa man kāna maytan fa-aḥyaynāhu waja`alnā lahu nūran yamshī bihi fin nāsi kaman mathaluhu fiẓ ẓulumāti laysa bikhārijin minhā ۚ kadhālika zuyyina lilkāfirīna mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ أَكَـٰبِرَ مُجْرِمِيهَا لِيَمْكُرُوا۟ فِيهَا ۖ وَمَا يَمْكُرُونَ إِلَّا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Thus have We placed leaders in every town, its wicked men, to plot (and burrow) therein: but they only plot against their own souls, and they perceive it not.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika ja`alnā fī kulli qaryatin akābira mujrimīhā liyamkurū fīhā ۖ wa mā yamkurūna illā bi-anfusihim wa mā yash`urūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَةٌ قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ حَتَّىٰ نُؤْتَىٰ مِثْلَ مَآ أُوتِىَ رُسُلُ ٱللَّهِ ۘ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ حَيْثُ يَجْعَلُ رِسَالَتَهُۥ ۗ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ صَغَارٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَمْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: When there comes to them a sign (from Allah), They say: "We shall not believe until we receive one (exactly) like those received by Allah's messengers." Allah knoweth best where (and how) to carry out His mission. Soon will the wicked be overtaken by humiliation before Allah, and a severe punishment, for all their plots.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā jā-at hum āyatun qālū lan nu-mina ḥattā nu-tā mithla mā ūtiya rusulullāh ۘ allāhu a`lamu ḥaythu yaj`alu risālatah ۗ sayuṣībul ladhīna ajramū ṣaghārun `indallāhi wa`adhābun shadīdun bimā kānū yamkurūn

ayas.arabic: فَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَهْدِيَهُۥ يَشْرَحْ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ ۖ وَمَن يُرِدْ أَن يُضِلَّهُۥ يَجْعَلْ صَدْرَهُۥ ضَيِّقًا حَرَجًا كَأَنَّمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّجْسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Those whom Allah (in His plan) willeth to guide,- He openeth their breast to Islam; those whom He willeth to leave straying,- He maketh their breast close and constricted, as if they had to climb up to the skies: thus doth Allah (heap) the penalty on those who refuse to believe.
ayas.transliteration: faman yuridillāhu an yahdiyahu yashraḥ ṣadrahu lilislām ۖ wa man yurid an yuḍillahu yaj`al ṣadrahu ḍayyiqan ḥarajan ka-annamā yaṣṣa``adu fis samā-i ۚ kadhālika yaj`alullāhur rijsa `alal ladhīna lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَهَـٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسْتَقِيمًا ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: This is the way of thy Lord, leading straight: We have detailed the signs for those who receive admonition.
ayas.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mustaqīmā ۗ qad faṣṣalnal-āyāti liqawmiy yadhhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: لَهُمْ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: For them will be a home of peace in the presence of their Lord: He will be their friend, because they practised (righteousness).
ayas.transliteration: lahum dārus salāmi `inda rabbihim ۖ wahuwa waliyyuhum bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ قَدِ ٱسْتَكْثَرْتُم مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ ۖ وَقَالَ أَوْلِيَآؤُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ رَبَّنَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ بَعْضُنَا بِبَعْضٍ وَبَلَغْنَآ أَجَلَنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَجَّلْتَ لَنَا ۚ قَالَ ٱلنَّارُ مَثْوَىٰكُمْ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: One day will He gather them all together, (and say): "O ye assembly of Jinns! Much (toll) did ye take of men." Their friends amongst men will say: "Our Lord! we made profit from each other: but (alas!) we reached our term - which thou didst appoint for us." He will say: "The Fire be your dwelling-place: you will dwell therein for ever, except as Allah willeth." for thy Lord is full of wisdom and knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: wayawma yaḥshuruhum jamī`an yāma`sharal jinni qadis-takthartum minal-ins ۖ waqāla awliyā-uhum minal-insi rabbanas-tamta`a ba`ḍunā biba`ḍin wabalaghnā ajalanal ladhī ajjalta lanā ۚ qālan nāru mathwākum khālidīna fīhā illā mā shā-allāh ۗ inna rabbaka ḥakīmun `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّى بَعْضَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعْضًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Thus do we make the wrong-doers turn to each other, because of what they earn.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī ba`ḍaẓ ẓālimīna ba`ḍan bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ شَهِدْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِنَا ۖ وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَشَهِدُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ كَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: "O ye assembly of Jinns and men! came there not unto you messengers from amongst you, setting forth unto you My signs, and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say: "We bear witness against ourselves." It was the life of this world that deceived them. So against themselves will they bear witness that they rejected Faith.
ayas.transliteration: yāma`sharal jinni wal-insi alam ya-tikum rusulun minkum yaquṣṣūna `alaykum āyātī wayundhirūnakum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā ۚ qālū shahidnā `alā anfusinā ۖ wagharrat-humul ḥayātud dunyā washahidū `alā anfusihim annahum kānū kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمْ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهْلِكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْمٍ وَأَهْلُهَا غَـٰفِلُونَ
ayas.translation: (The messengers were sent) thus, for thy Lord would not destroy for their wrong-doing men's habitations whilst their occupants were unwarned.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika an lam yakun rabbuka muhlikal qurā biẓul-min wa-ahluhā ghāfilūn

ayas.arabic: وَلِكُلٍّ دَرَجَـٰتٌ مِّمَّا عَمِلُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: To all are degrees (or ranks) according to their deeds: for thy Lord is not unmindful of anything that they do.
ayas.transliteration: walikullin darajātun mimmā `amilū ۚ wa mā rabbuka bighāfilin `ammā ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ذُو ٱلرَّحْمَةِ ۚ إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَسْتَخْلِفْ مِنۢ بَعْدِكُم مَّا يَشَآءُ كَمَآ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن ذُرِّيَّةِ قَوْمٍ ءَاخَرِينَ
ayas.translation: Thy Lord is self-sufficient, full of Mercy: if it were His will, He could destroy you, and in your place appoint whom He will as your successors, even as He raised you up from the posterity of other people.
ayas.transliteration: warabbukal ghaniyyu dhur raḥmah ۚ in yasha-yudh-hibkum wayastakhlif min ba`dikum mā yashā-u kamā ansha-akum min dhurriyyati qawmin ākharīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَـَٔاتٍ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
ayas.translation: All that hath been promised unto you will come to pass: nor can ye frustrate it (in the least bit).
ayas.transliteration: inna mā tū`adūna la-āt ۖ wa mā antum bimu`jizīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَامِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "O my people! Do whatever ye can: I will do (my part): soon will ye know who it is whose end will be (best) in the Hereafter: certain it is that the wrong-doers will not prosper."
ayas.transliteration: qul yāqawmi'-malū `alā makānatikum innī `āmil ۖ fasawfa ta`lamūna man takūnu lahu `āqibatud dār ۗ innahu lā yufliḥuẓ ẓālimūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ مِمَّا ذَرَأَ مِنَ ٱلْحَرْثِ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ نَصِيبًا فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا لِلَّهِ بِزَعْمِهِمْ وَهَـٰذَا لِشُرَكَآئِنَا ۖ فَمَا كَانَ لِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ فَلَا يَصِلُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ إِلَىٰ شُرَكَآئِهِمْ ۗ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
ayas.translation: Out of what Allah hath produced in abundance in tilth and in cattle, they assigned Him a share: they say, according to their fancies: "This is for Allah, and this" - for our "partners"! but the share of their" partners "reacheth not Allah, whilst the share of Allah reacheth their "partners"! evil (and unjust) is their assignment!
ayas.transliteration: waja`alū lillāhi mimmā dhara-a minal ḥarthi wal-an`āmi naṣīban faqālū hādhā lillāhi biza`mihim wahādhā lishurakā-inā ۖ famā kāna lishurakā-ihim falā yaṣilu ilallāh ۖ wa mā kāna lillāhi fahuwa yaṣilu ilā shurakā-ihim ۗ sā-a mā yaḥkumūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثِيرٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ قَتْلَ أَوْلَـٰدِهِمْ شُرَكَآؤُهُمْ لِيُرْدُوهُمْ وَلِيَلْبِسُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ دِينَهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا فَعَلُوهُ ۖ فَذَرْهُمْ وَمَا يَفْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Even so, in the eyes of most of the pagans, their "partners" made alluring the slaughter of their children, in order to lead them to their own destruction, and cause confusion in their religion. If Allah had willed, they would not have done so: But leave alone them and their inventions.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika zayyana likathīrin minal mushrikīna qatla awlādihim shurakā-uhum liyurdūhum waliyalbisū `alayhim dīnahum ۖ walaw shā-allāhu mā fa`alūh ۖ fadharhum wa mā yaftarūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَنْعَـٰمٌ وَحَرْثٌ حِجْرٌ لَّا يَطْعَمُهَآ إِلَّا مَن نَّشَآءُ بِزَعْمِهِمْ وَأَنْعَـٰمٌ حُرِّمَتْ ظُهُورُهَا وَأَنْعَـٰمٌ لَّا يَذْكُرُونَ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا ٱفْتِرَآءً عَلَيْهِ ۚ سَيَجْزِيهِم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: And they say that such and such cattle and crops are taboo, and none should eat of them except those whom - so they say - We wish; further, there are cattle forbidden to yoke or burden, and cattle on which, (at slaughter), the name of Allah is not pronounced; - inventions against Allah's name: soon will He requite them for their inventions.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū hādhihi an`āmun waḥarthun ḥijrul lā yaṭ`amuhā illā man nashā-u biza`mihim wa-an`āmun ḥurrimat ẓuhūruhā wa-an`āmul lā yadhkurūnas-mallāhi `alayhaf-tirā-an `alayh ۚ sayajzīhim bimā kānū yaftarūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا فِى بُطُونِ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ خَالِصَةٌ لِّذُكُورِنَا وَمُحَرَّمٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِنَا ۖ وَإِن يَكُن مَّيْتَةً فَهُمْ فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ ۚ سَيَجْزِيهِمْ وَصْفَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: They say: "What is in the wombs of such and such cattle is specially reserved (for food) for our men, and forbidden to our women; but if it is still-born, then all have share therein. For their (false) attribution (of superstitions to Allah), He will soon punish them: for He is full of wisdom and knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū mā fī buṭūni hādhihil-an`āmi khāliṣatun lidhukūrinā wa muḥarramun `alā azwājinā ۖ wa in yakun maytatan fahum fīhi shurakā-u ۚ sayajzīhim waṣfahum ۚ innahu ḥakīmun `alīm

ayas.arabic: قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَتَلُوٓا۟ أَوْلَـٰدَهُمْ سَفَهًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَحَرَّمُوا۟ مَا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱفْتِرَآءً عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
ayas.translation: Lost are those who slay their children, from folly, without knowledge, and forbid food which Allah hath provided for them, inventing (lies) against Allah. They have indeed gone astray and heeded no guidance.
ayas.transliteration: qad khasiral ladhīna qatalū awlādahum safahan bighayri `il-min waḥarramū mā razaqahumullāhuf-tirā-an `alallāh ۚ qad ḍallū wa mā kānū muhtadīn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ جَنَّـٰتٍ مَّعْرُوشَـٰتٍ وَغَيْرَ مَعْرُوشَـٰتٍ وَٱلنَّخْلَ وَٱلزَّرْعَ مُخْتَلِفًا أُكُلُهُۥ وَٱلزَّيْتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُتَشَـٰبِهًا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَـٰبِهٍ ۚ كُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثْمَرَ وَءَاتُوا۟ حَقَّهُۥ يَوْمَ حَصَادِهِۦ ۖ وَلَا تُسْرِفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayas.translation: It is He Who produceth gardens, with trellises and without, and dates, and tilth with produce of all kinds, and olives and pomegranates, similar (in kind) and different (in variety): eat of their fruit in their season, but render the dues that are proper on the day that the harvest is gathered. But waste not by excess: for Allah loveth not the wasters.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī ansha-a jannātin ma`rūshātin waghayra ma`rūshātin wan nakhla waz zar`a mukhtalifan ukuluhu waz zaytūna war rummāna mutashābihan waghayra mutashābih ۚ kulū min thamarihi idhā athmara wa-ātū ḥaqqahu yawma ḥaṣādih ۖ walā tusrifū ۚ innahu lā yuḥibbul musrifīn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ حَمُولَةً وَفَرْشًا ۚ كُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Of the cattle are some for burden and some for meat: eat what Allah hath provided for you, and follow not the footsteps of Satan: for he is to you and avowed enemy.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal-an`āmi ḥamūlatan wafarshā ۚ kulū mimmā razaqakumullāhu walā tattabi`ū khuṭuwātish shayṭān ۚ innahu lakum `aduwwun mubīn

ayas.arabic: ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۖ مِّنَ ٱلضَّأْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَمِنَ ٱلْمَعْزِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۗ قُلْ ءَآلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ أَمَّا ٱشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَرْحَامُ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۖ نَبِّـُٔونِى بِعِلْمٍ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: (Take) eight (head of cattle) in (four) pairs: of sheep a pair, and of goats a pair; say, hath He forbidden the two males, or the two females, or (the young) which the wombs of the two females enclose? Tell me with knowledge if ye are truthful:
ayas.transliteration: thamāniyata azwāj ۖ minaḍ ḍa-nith-nayni wa minal ma`zith-nayn ۗ qul ādhhakarayni ḥarrama amil-unthayayni ammash-tamalat `alayhi arḥāmul-unthayayn ۖ nabbi-ūnī bi`il-min in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْإِبِلِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَمِنَ ٱلْبَقَرِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۗ قُلْ ءَآلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ أَمَّا ٱشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَرْحَامُ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۖ أَمْ كُنتُمْ شُهَدَآءَ إِذْ وَصَّىٰكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا ۚ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا لِّيُضِلَّ ٱلنَّاسَ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Of camels a pair, and oxen a pair; say, hath He forbidden the two males, or the two females, or (the young) which the wombs of the two females enclose? - Were ye present when Allah ordered you such a thing? But who doth more wrong than one who invents a lie against Allah, to lead astray men without knowledge? For Allah guideth not people who do wrong.
